title: Champion Skill/Difficulty Suggestion
body:
It's too difficult to get a feel of how hard a champion is, based on the number of bars, it doesn't say: easy/medium/hard, it just expects us to know that already. Which I think for new players would be difficult, first because we don't know how many bars is hard, because plainly we can't see the max number of bars.

So it'd be much better if we can see dark lines to show where the remaining bars would be, or a mouseover on difficult will tell you how difficult the champion is.
